TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebHttpBehavior extends System.Object implements class System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior

summary.span: 啟用 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 服務的 Web 程式設計模型。

span.span: Enables the Web programming model for a Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 搭配使用時的行為繫結，可讓 WCF 公開並存取 Web 樣式服務。The behavior, when used in conjunction with the binding, enables WCF to expose and access Web style services. 請注意， 會將這個行為自動加入至使用 的端點。 automatically adds this behavior to endpoints that use the .

span.span: The endpoint that exposes the contract.

summary.span: 建立新的 物件。

span.span: Creates a new object.

returns.span: 的執行個體，其中包含指定之端點的作業選取器。

span.span: An instance of that contains the operation selector for the specified endpoint.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將呼叫對應至統一資源識別元 (URI) 後置字元為基礎的 WCF 服務作業和使用的 HTTP 方法。The maps calls to WCF service operations based on the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) suffix and the HTTP method used. 這是衍生行為可使用的擴充點，可以用來提供本身的 實作，而該實作會將傳入 HTTP 要求對應至服務作業。This is an extensibility point that derived behaviors can use to supply their own implementation of that maps the incoming HTTP request to a service operation.

abstract member GetQueryStringConverter : System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription -> System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.QueryStringConverter override this.GetQueryStringConverter : System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription -> System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.QueryStringConverter

span.span: The service operation.

summary.span: 取得查詢字串轉換器。

span.span: Gets the query string converter.
A instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是衍生行為可使用的擴充點，可以用來提供本身的 實作，而該實作可以來回轉換服務作業的參數型別和 HTTP 要求 URL 的查詢字串。This is an extensibility point that derived behaviors can use to supply their own implementation of that can convert the service operation parameter types to and from the HTTP request URL's query string.

The service endpoint.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是衍生行為可使用的擴充點，可以用來提供本身的 實作，而呼叫此實作即可將回應訊息還原序列化為服務作業的 out 參數/傳回值。This is an extensibility point that derived behaviors can use to supply their own implementation of that is called to deserialize the response message into the out parameters/return value of the service operation.

The service endpoint.

returns.span: 對指定之作業和端點在服務上的回覆格式器的 參考。

span.span: An reference to the reply formatter on the service for the specified operation and endpoint.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是衍生行為可使用的擴充點，可以用來提供本身的 實作，而呼叫此實作即可將服務作業的傳回值/out 參數轉換成回應訊息。This is an extensibility point that derived behaviors can use to supply their own implementation of that is called to convert the return value/out parameters of the service operation to a response message.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IClientMessageFormatter GetRequestClientFormatter (System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription operationDescription, System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint endpoint);

span.span: The service operation.
The service endpoint.

summary.span: 取得指定之服務作業和端點在用戶端上的要求格式器。

span.span: Gets the request formatter on the client for the specified service operation and endpoint.

returns.span: 對指定之作業和端點在用戶端上的要求格式器的 參考。

span.span: An reference to the request formatter on the client for the specified operation and endpoint.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是衍生行為可使用的擴充點，可以用來提供本身的 實作，而呼叫此實作即可將服務作業呼叫中的輸入參數轉換成要求訊息。This is an extensibility point that derived behaviors can use to supply their own implementation of that is called to convert the input parameters of the service operation call to a request message. 在服務作業之 中指定的參數必須序列化為要求訊息的 `To` URI，而其他參數則必須序列化為要求訊息的本文。Parameters specified in the of the service operation must be serialized to the `To` URI of the request message and other parameters must be serialized to the body of the request message.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IDispatchMessageFormatter GetRequestDispatchFormatter (System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription operationDescription, System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint endpoint);

.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IDispatchMessageFormatter GetRequestDispatchFormatter(class System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription operationDescription, class System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint endpoint) cil managed

abstract member GetRequestDispatchFormatter : System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription * System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint -> System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IDispatchMessageFormatter override this.GetRequestDispatchFormatter : System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription * System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint -> System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IDispatchMessageFormatter

span.span: The service operation.
The service endpoint.

summary.span: 取得指定之服務作業和服務端點在服務上的要求格式器。

span.span: Gets the request formatter on the service for the given service operation and service endpoint.

returns.span: 對指定之作業和端點在服務上的要求格式器的 參考。

span.span: An reference to the request formatter on the service for the specified operation and endpoint.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是衍生行為可使用的擴充點，可以用來提供本身的 實作，而呼叫此實作即可從要求訊息中還原序列化服務作業的輸入參數。This is an extensibility point that derived behaviors can use to supply their own implementation of that is called to deserialize the input parameters of the service operation from the request message. 在服務作業之 中指定的參數必須從要求訊息的 `To` URI 還原序列化，而其他參數則必須從要求訊息的本文還原序列化。Parameters specified in the of the service operation must be deserialized from the `To` URI of the request message and other parameters must be deserialized from the body of the request message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關 WCF REST 說明頁面的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [WCF Web HTTP 服務說明的網頁](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/wcf-web-http-service-help-page.md)。For more information about the WCF REST Help page, see [WCF Web HTTP Service Help Page](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/wcf-web-http-service-help-page.md). 若要在組態檔中啟用 helpEnabled 屬性：To enable the helpEnabled attribute in a configuration file: ``` ``` 若要以程式設計的方式啟用 HelpEnabled 屬性：To programmatically enable the HelpEnabled property: ``` WebHttpBehavior helpBehavior = new WebHttpBehavior(); helpBehavior.HelpEnabled = true; host.Description.Endpoints[0].Behaviors.Add(helpBehavior); ```

span.span: The service endpoint.

summary.span: 確認端點符合 Web 程式設計模型的需求。

span.span: Confirms that the endpoint meets the requirements for the Web programming model.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 驗證下列各項：Verifies the following: - 端點不是 `null`。The endpoint is not `null`. - 端點使用 HTTP 或 HTTPS 配置。The endpoint uses the HTTP or HTTPS schemes. - 繫結的 設定為 。The of the binding is set to . - 繫結包含 ，其中 已設定為 `true`。The binding contains an where is set to `true`. - 中指定的參數必須是作業的一部分。The parameters specified in the must be part of the operation. - 指定 的作業最多有一個輸入參數，而且不能有任何 out 參數。Operations that specify have, at most, one input parameter and can have no out parameters.
